name: SOCIETY FOR PARTICIPATORY INTEGRATED DEVELOPMENT
briefDescription: SPID is registered under Societies Registration Act XXI of 1860 from GNCT of Delhi. SPID also has FCRA, 80G , 12AA, PAN & TAN certificate. SPID works on following issues like Women Empowerment(running Gender Resource Center,SHG, Vocational Trainings for Girls, IGP), Open Shelter for children of women in Prostitution in red light area of Delhi(GB Road), Creche, Balwadi for children of Construction workers at construction site, Vocational Training for children from weaker section and job assistance, advocacy on Housing, unorganised sector workers & urban slum's issues etc.Our geographical coverage - A)Delhi(GB road, Mangolpuri, Uttam Nagar, Savda Ghewra, Mayapuri etc.),B) Uttar Pradesh-Agra, Chandauli & Varanasi districts, C) Haryana (Gurgaon)
